body:
Hi Thomas,

Thomas Bleicher wrote:

Yes they seem to have the most stable well developed version of
Intellicad. I keep meaning to take a more serious look at it. But it can
even be a pain between different variants of Autocad (eg, basic autocad
and adt for example).

Gee, I am pretty sure that there is not a Linux version of Photosphere.
But if this is otherwise..... Though, there are several command line
tools  (hdrgen)  that he has kindly made available  in compiled form for
Linux/Unix.


--
# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
